content: half_double_crochet decrease you made in row 16 @chelseacrochets_ 7 for the second tie please see instructions for long spiral ties on page 4 after the very last slip_stitch place an additional slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet decrease you made in row 16 fasten_off and weave in ends congratulations you re all finished i hope you enjoyed crocheting your piper headband if you have any additional questions or concerns please feel free to reach out to me via email at chelsea carsen@gmail com or on instagram at @chelseacrochets_ thank you for your download and continued support @chelseacrochets_ 8
